hooks.prompt: Tip: Run /status for a daily briefing of your recordings, memory index health, and untranscribed backlog.
COST WARNING: Transcription uses ElevenLabs API credits. Cached transcripts return instantly at no cost. Use get_recording(file_ref) first to check if transcript_cached is true.

COST WARNING: Ingestion with source='all' will transcribe ALL untranscribed recordings via ElevenLabs (costs credits). Use dry_run=true first to see the cost estimate, or source='cache' to only ingest already-cached transcripts (free).
